issue.summary: Login page not responsive on mobile devices
issue.description:
The login page doesn't render properly on mobile devices with screen widths below 768px. The form elements are cut off and the submit button is not accessible.

## Steps to Reproduce
1. Open the login page on mobile device
2. Try to fill in credentials
3. Notice the layout issues

## Expected Behavior
The login form should be fully responsive and accessible on all device sizes.
